name: Ariana Gomez
feedback: Plenture completely changed how I care for my plants. Everything is tracked in one place and easy to manage!
The watering reminders are so helpful—I haven’t missed a date since I started using it. Highly recommend!

name: Md. Farhan
feedback: This app is a life-saver for plant lovers! Super clean and smooth interface with all care details in one view.
I love how I can add photos and categories for each plant. Would be great to have a mobile app too!

name: Minara Akter
feedback: Simple and effective! I’ve logged all my plants and their watering needs. It keeps everything organized.
The UI is lovely and matches the natural vibe. I also like the personalized dashboard experience!
